Package EntityObject

Class Student

java.lang.Object
EntityObject.AbstractUser
EntityObject.Student
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Student
extends AbstractUser
This class represents a Student in NTU during STARS
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void deregisterAUs​(int AUs)
    Subtract AU of course that student is dropping from total AU
    void deregisterCourse​(java.lang.String courseCode)
    Remove a course code and index from the student registeredCourses TreeMap If the course code exists in student's registeredCourses TreeMap, remove the course and its corresponding index from the student's registeredCourses TreeMap Else if the codes code exists in student's registerWaitListCourse TreeMap, remove the course and its corresponding index from the student's registerWaitListCourse TreeMap else throw NonExistentCourseException

    Gets a String that represents the student's matric number

    Gets the Max AU the student can have

    Gets the list of courses that is registered by the student
    int getTotalRegisteredAUs()
    Gets the total registered AUs that the student currently have
    java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> getWaitingListCourses()
    For a course that student is wait listed in, get TreeMap of course codes and indexes
    void registerAUs​(int AUs)
    Add AU of a course to the student total AUs
    void registerCourse​(java.lang.String courseCode, int indexNumber)
    Add a course and index to the student registeredCourses TreeMap If the course code exists in student's registeredCourses TreeMap, throw ExistingCourseException Else if the codes code exists in student's waiting list courses TreeMap, delete it from the waitingListCourses TreeMap else add the course code and index to the student's registeredCourses TreeMap
    void registerWaitListCourse​(java.lang.String courseCode, int indexNumber)
    Add a course and index to the student's registerWaitListCourse TreeMap If the course code exists in the student's registerWaitListCourse TreeMap, throw ExistingCourseException Else add the course and index into the student's registerWaitListCourse TreeMap

    Sets the matric number of the student

  • Constructor Details

    • Student

      public Student​(java.lang.String name, School school, Gender gender, Nationality nationality, int maxAUs, java.util.Random random) throws PasswordStorage.CannotPerformOperationException
      Creates student containing student specific information. Student information to be set by administrative user
      Parameters:
      name - A String that represents the student name
      school - An Enum value of the school that is offering the course
      gender - An Enum value of the gender that the student belongs to
      nationality - An Enum value of the nationality of the student
      maxAUs - An integer thar represents to number of AUs a student can have
      random - An object that helps to generate the student's matric number
      Throws:
      PasswordStorage.CannotPerformOperationException - unsafe to hash password
      See Also:
      School, Gender

  • Method Details

    • getMatricNumber

      public java.lang.String getMatricNumber()
      Gets a String that represents the student's matric number
      Returns:
      String that represents student's matric number

    • setMatricNumber

      public void setMatricNumber​(java.lang.String matricNumber)
      Sets the matric number of the student
      Parameters:
      matricNumber - A String that represents the student's matric number

    • registerCourse

      public void registerCourse​(java.lang.String courseCode, int indexNumber) throws ExistingCourseException
      Add a course and index to the student registeredCourses TreeMap If the course code exists in student's registeredCourses TreeMap, throw ExistingCourseException Else if the codes code exists in student's waiting list courses TreeMap, delete it from the waitingListCourses TreeMap else add the course code and index to the student's registeredCourses TreeMap
      Parameters:
      courseCode - A String that represents the course code of the course
      indexNumber - An Integer that represents the index number of the course
      Throws:
      ExistingCourseException - course already registered

    • deregisterCourse

      public void deregisterCourse​(java.lang.String courseCode) throws NonExistentCourseException
      Remove a course code and index from the student registeredCourses TreeMap If the course code exists in student's registeredCourses TreeMap, remove the course and its corresponding index from the student's registeredCourses TreeMap Else if the codes code exists in student's registerWaitListCourse TreeMap, remove the course and its corresponding index from the student's registerWaitListCourse TreeMap else throw NonExistentCourseException
      Parameters:
      courseCode - A String that represents the course code of the course
      Throws:
      NonExistentCourseException - course not registered

    • registerWaitListCourse

      public void registerWaitListCourse​(java.lang.String courseCode, int indexNumber) throws ExistingCourseException
      Add a course and index to the student's registerWaitListCourse TreeMap If the course code exists in the student's registerWaitListCourse TreeMap, throw ExistingCourseException Else add the course and index into the student's registerWaitListCourse TreeMap
      Parameters:
      courseCode - A String that represents the course code of the course
      indexNumber - An Integer that represents the index number of the course
      Throws:
      ExistingCourseException - course already registered

    • getRegisteredCourses

      public java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> getRegisteredCourses()
      Gets the list of courses that is registered by the student
      Returns:
      A TreeMap containing course codes in String and index of the course in Integer

    • getWaitingListCourses

      public java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> getWaitingListCourses()
      For a course that student is wait listed in, get TreeMap of course codes and indexes
      Returns:
      A TreeMap as defined above.

    • registerAUs

      public void registerAUs​(int AUs)
      Add AU of a course to the student total AUs
      Parameters:
      AUs - Integer representing AUs of the course

    • deregisterAUs

      public void deregisterAUs​(int AUs)
      Subtract AU of course that student is dropping from total AU
      Parameters:
      AUs - Integer representing number of AUs of the course that the student is dropping

    • getMaxAUs

      public int getMaxAUs()
      Gets the Max AU the student can have
      Returns:
      maxAUs Integer of the maximum number of AUs the student can have
